law.catch_line: Contract Evaluation Procedures and State Statutes

text.section: The parties state that it is their express intention and agreement that the evaluation procedures set forth in this Article are the sole evaluation procedures applicable in the Springboro Community City School District for the employees in the bargaining unit covered by this AGREEMENT and that such evaluation procedures totally replace and are in lieu of evaluation procedures set forth in the Ohio Revised Code Section 3319.111.
